name: HTTPLayer
summary: Straight to the Point HTTP Networking for JSON Services in Swift
description:
A framework intending to abstract URLSessions and HTTP Requests to help avoid repeting code and lenghty methods.
It is a framework intended for Swift 5 only and implemented using generics so its possible to receive any type of response as long as it conforms to Codable.
All responses once successfully parsed are wrapped on the Swift's 5 Result object.
